Html: I made change (removed emoticons button), built new dll using visual studio 2005 but now the editor is double spacing; i.e.: skips a line when I press 'enter'.Â  Hope someone has a solution...

The version of the control in the release is more than 6 months older than the code in the code section so what you're seeing could have nothing to do with any changes you made. I would try building the unchanged source to see if it was your changes or something in the newer version of the RTE source. Also realize that <p> tags may look differently in the RTE versus your pages due to differences in CSS. Hope that helps.
